title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8501.5 - Location of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8501.5 - Location of records

State Regulations

Records shall be available for public inspection and copying
at the offices of the New York State Office of Business Permits, Alfred E. Smith Office Building, 17th Floor, Albany, NY 12225. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8501.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
